# Generated by iptables-save v1.6.0 on Thu Oct 12 20:31:25 2017
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.101/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 21 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.101/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 21 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.101/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 4444 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --sport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p udp -m udp --sport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.1.101/32 -p tcp -m tcp --sport 21 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.1.101/32 -p udp -m udp --sport 21 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --sport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p udp -m udp --sport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.1.101/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 4445 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -d 192.168.1.101/32 -p tcp -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -j DROP
COMMIT
# Completed on Thu Oct 12 20:31:25 2017
